title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
2 points maximum

Identify direct source of energy (1 point)

· Seed

· Stored organic nutrients/carbohydrates

Identify plant part (1 point)

· Roots
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the available points.

Identify direct source of energy (1 point)

· Seed

· Stored organic nutrients/carbohydrates

Identify plant part (1 point)

· Roots

Student response earns one of the available points.

· Seed

· Stored organic nutrients/carbohydrates

Identify plant part (1 point)

· Roots

Student response earns two of the available points.

· Seed

· Stored organic nutrients/carbohydrates

· Roots

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point maximum

Identification (1 point)

· Any value between 45-55 percent
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the available points.

Identification (1 point)

· Any value between 45-55 percent

Student response earns one of the available points.

Identification (1 point)

· Any value between 45-55 percent

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point maximum

Proposed advantage (1 point)

· Increased chance of reproduction before the plants die.

· If the plants do not use the strategy, they decrease the likelihood they will ever reproduce.
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the available points.

Proposed advantage (1 point)

· Increased chance of reproduction before the plants die.

· If the plants do not use the strategy, they decrease the likelihood they will ever reproduce.

Student response earns one of the available points.

Proposed advantage (1 point)

· If the plants do not use the strategy, they decrease the likelihood they will ever reproduce.
